column4: Me again, I successfuly created a new partition where windows should go. Does anyone know how to create a bootable usb (like a live usb, not sure what the proper terminology is) from a windows iso? (the iso contains the installer, not a system image)
On a side note, I also have windows running on virtualbox. Is it possible to create a system image from this and copy that straight onto the new partition?
You could ask that in the channel #windows.
I did, no one knew a sure fire method for it surprisingly
